topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0 Carrier Grade Beta: Installing Infoblox

p.b: Deploy and Configure Infoblox Openstack Adapter (IOA) VM in ESX

section.p: Infoblox vNIOS™ (Network Infrastructure Operating System) for VMware® allows deployment of a virtualized instance of an Infoblox appliance.
IOA template can be found under following location.

To deploy the template in ESX:
Launch the VMware vCenter client.
Click File, then Deploy OVF Template.
In the Deploy OVF Template wizard, browse to the location of the nios-7.0.2-269928-2015-02-10-18-03-07-160G-820.ova file.
Click Next and complete the wizard:
Review the details for the installation and click Finish.

ol.li: Login to VM console from vCenter using user/password (admin/infoblox)
Run command set network to configure IP address of vNIOS
Run command set temp_license to configure trial license (60 days). Choose option 8
Login to Infoblox portal using admin/infoblox credentials:
Open web browser to login to Infoblox IPAM GUI https://<IPaddress> (admin/infoblox)

Go to Administration > Extensible Attributes and add following attributes:
Configuring Extensible Attributes

body.p: For details please refer to attached quickstart guide for more details (OpenStack_Kilo_QSG_Draft.pdf)

ul.li: Download Infoblox patch from following location to HLM node
Untar the tarball using - tar -zvxf infoblox.tar.gz
Modify /var/hlm/clouds/<cloudname>/desired_state/<cloudname>/001/base/stage/ansible/deploy-infoblox.yml to include appropriate tier name (Replace <CLOUDNAME> with actual cloudname)
Modify /var/hlm/clouds/<cloudname>/desired_state/<cloudname>/001/base/stage/ansible/rollback-infoblox.yml to include appropriate tier name (Replace <CLOUDNAME> with actual cloudname)

Modify /var/hlm/clouds/<cloudname>/desired_state/<cloudname>/001/base/stage/ansible/roles/infoblox/defaults/main.yml to include environment variables:
ioa_ipaddress: <IP ADDRESS OF THE INFOBLOX OPENSTACK ADAPTER VM>
ioa_username: <USERNAME TO LOGIN TO INFOBLOX OPENSTACK ADAPTER>
ioa_password: <PASSWORD TO LOGIN TO INFOBLOX OPENSTACK ADAPTER>
certfile_path: <CERTFILE PATH AS DEFINED IN STACKRC>
Execute following command to apply patch - ansible-playbook -i hosts deploy-infoblox.yml
